snippet: Lobbied by runners, politicians and the public after Hurricane Sandy, officials and organizers decided not to hold the New York City Marathon for the first time since 1970.
lead_paragraph: Lobbied by runners, politicians and the public after Hurricane Sandy, officials and organizers decided not to hold the New York City Marathon for the first time since 1970.

headline.seo: New York City Marathon Will Not Be Held Sunday
headline.main: After Days of Pressure, Marathon Is Off
headline.sub:
Opposition Swelled
After Storm, With
Recovery Struggling
